title: Asphalt 8 Airborne 1.6.0.8 [WP8.1] [TeRMiNaToR]
description:
Asphalt 8 Airborne 1.6.0.8 [WP8.1] [TeRMiNaToR]
LEAVE GRAVITY IN THE DUST
The best arcade racing game series reaches a new turning point! Perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts in an intense driving experience powered by a brand-new physics engine!

LUXURY DREAM CARS

GET AIRBORNE

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perform barrel rolls and wild 360Ã‚Âº jumps 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Maneuver through the air, pulling stunts while racing

NEW EXOTIC LOCATIONS

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Discover plenty of hidden shortcuts

NEW FEATURES FOR SPEED FREAKS

SIMULTANEOUS MULTIPLAYER & GHOST CHALLENGES
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real opponents!

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A heart-thumping mix of amazing licensed music for your game
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Featuring real tracks from Bloc Party, Mutemath & The Crystal Method!

A game for fans of extreme arcade racing, with real dream cars and phenomenal graphics that will also please racing simulation enthusiasts.

Discover the game's BIGGEST update since it launched!

- Discover the high-speed heat of San Diego Harbor. Take off from an aircraft carrier and dodge helicopters while taking in the sights!

- 5 new cars to master: The Koenigsegg One: 1, Mazda Furai, Maserati MC12, Savage Rivale GTR and Peugeot Onyx. Look for each one coming out over the weeks to come!

- Multiplayer Events: Race head-to-head for the ultimate rewards!

- 4 new car collections. Time to stock your garage and get your rewards!
